references.paper_title: Image segmentation using deep learning: A survey
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of image segmentation using deep learning, which is the core topic of the current research.

references.paper_title: Deep residual learning for image recognition
references.reason: This foundational paper introduces the ResNet architecture, which is widely used in image segmentation and has significantly advanced the field.

references.paper_title: An image is worth 16x16 words: Transformers for image recognition at scale
references.reason: This paper introduces the Vision Transformer (ViT), a novel approach to image recognition that has shown great promise and has influenced the image segmentation field.
This paper is a seminal work in few-shot semantic segmentation and has laid the groundwork for many subsequent works in this area.

references.paper_title: CANet: Class-agnostic segmentation networks with iterative refinement and attentive few-shot learning
references.reason: This paper introduces CANet, a class-agnostic segmentation network that is highly relevant to the generalized few-shot semantic segmentation setting.
